short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will show covid-19 hope feeds in new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You know we’re in a global health crisis, but how do we keep up-to-date with positive, constructive progress without drowning in bad news that doesn’t help anyone? 

This is why Bright Yellow created Covid-19 Hope: a Covid-19 news feed focusing on positive updates and constructive calls to action.
